rooms.description: An open-plan area that merges the living space with an adjoining kitchen for a minimalist aesthetic.
Fully integrated open kitchen design ensuring natural ventilation and plenty of light from the east-facing window.
Primary bedroom with an attached ensuite bathroom, designed to face north for calm and positive energy.
A dedicated library space adjacent to the living area, ensuring ample daylight and quiet atmosphere.
Ensuite bathroom in the bedroom, designed with minimalist fixtures for efficient space usage.

openings.description: Large windows providing abundant natural light and ventilation in the living area and kitchen.
Main entrance door oriented towards a serene view aligning with Vastu recommendations.
